instruction: Create a speech template for a wedding toast.
output:
Good evening everyone. I’d like to take this moment to congratulate [Bride] and [Groom] on their special day. It truly is a beautiful ceremony and I am honored to be standing here today with all of you celebrating this special union. [Bride] and [Groom], your synergy and affection for each other is evident and it’s clear that you are well-suited for each other. 
I hope that you cherish each other day after day and find joy in each other’s company for many years to come. May your marriage be filled with mutual respect, tenderness, and unconditional love. To [Bride] and [Groom]!
